<<<<<<< HEAD
Remember man both night and daye. Thou must nedes die, there is no nay
1 sheet ([1] p.)
By Willyam Powell for Willyam Pickering dwelling at Sainct Magnus corner, Imprinted at London : Anno. 1566. 21. August.
Verse - "Thy mortall body formed of clay,". Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
